website_summaries.verdict: An ice fishing rod that is expertly crafted from high-end materials and comes in a tough-to-find size.
pros: Includes a 100% high modulus graphite blank that guarantees the rod will continue to perform for an extended period of time
Smoked stainless steel guides with zirconium oxide inserts make the rod a top choice for inexperienced anglers
Solid cork handle offers comfort and grip
cons: More expensive than many other comparable rods

customer_reviews.title: This is the quality rod at a reasonable price you’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price. I’ve used mine on my IFish Pro with an Okuma ABF20 baitfeeder reel as well as a dead stick rod and jigging Rippin Raps, Jigs, various spoons etc. 4 stars only because it’s not a high end graphite rod with that kind of sensitivity. I own some higher end TUCRs but I don’t believe you need that to fill every role. That’s were this 36” Elite Tech comes in.
customer_reviews.author: BRL

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Overall great rod with good sensitivity and spine for lake trout fishing. Only complaint is that the eyelets are a little small for an ice rod causing "ice jams" but in reality I havent noticed much of a difference from other rods... if it's cold it is going to happen either way.
customer_reviews.author: wief

customer_reviews.title: Ice rod with CASTING HANDLE
customer_reviews.text: The answered questions are misleading. This is indeed an ice fishing rod, however it has a casting handle. This will not work with spinning reels. The description and title of the item are wrong. The picture is correct. UPDATE: I ordered the 30in medium rod. It appears all other rods may indeed have spinning handles.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: so glad not having a reel seat on a quality ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Really sensitive,strate eyes,so glad not having a reel seat on a quality ice rod is a thing of the past! Winter or summer with Fenwick you can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Paco

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Eyelets didnt match up with the center of the reel seat. Not sure if this is a manufacturer error but I sent it back. Stick with st. Croix if your spending a decent amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: adam weston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good action and great feel in your hand/ eyelet’s are a little small for ice fishing.
customer_reviews.author: fishead

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around ice fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: Very well-built ice fishing pole Good strong backbone with a fast tip A good-quality ice rod only bends at 2/3 of the rod length and fenwick's do just that
customer_reviews.author: Terry U.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 36-inch medium rod (Fenwick Elite TechTM Ice Spinning Rod). I received a 42-inch medium-heavy rod, which isn't even listed in the drop-down list, 36" being the longest in the list. (Note, the various email confirmations and shipping notices elide the item's details. The various lengths 16-36" and ultra-light to medium-heavy details are not stated in them.)
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: real nice. I gave it 1 star since it was ...
customer_reviews.text: These guys figured out how to fit a 30” fishing rod into a 20” box, just simply break it in half and then ship it, real nice. I gave it 1 star since it was the correct item at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoiumus

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel seat and good action
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ice rod.. I have 4 different lengths and a couple different actions, all are great rods for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great, well built product. Been using one the past couple of years so bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P. Benko

customer_reviews.title: Fenwick makes a great rod
customer_reviews.text: Used the rod for lake trout. It worked great. It has a nice sensitive tip and a good back bone.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Weed

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED WITH TIP BROKEN OFF (TIP NOT IN BOX) SENT ...
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED WITH TIP BROKEN OFF (TIP NOT IN BOX) SENT BACK FOR NEW ONE RECEIVED SECOND ONE WITH TIP BROKEN OFF AND NOT IN BOX.SENT BACK FOR REFUND !
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: ... to far away for my ice hole but has great action
customer_reviews.text: its a little to long i have to sit to far away for my ice hole but has great action
customer_reviews.author: troy hewitt

product_meta.title: Fenwick Elite Tech Ice Fishing Spinning Rod
feature_bullets: Smoked stainless steel guides with Zirconium oxide inserts
